languages.text: "Кажется, мы не были... должным образом представлены друг другу..." {n}— на губах молодого человека пузырится кровь, и говорит он едва слышно — но даже сейчас голос его не теряет мелодичности и ноток галантности.{/n} "Эвейн... Винтерскейл... аф Коронус. Бесконечно счастлив... встрече".

"I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, мы не были... должным образом представлены друг другу..." {n}— на губах молодого человека пузырится кровь, и говорит он едва слышно — но даже сейчас голос его не теряет мелодичности и ноток галантности.{/n} "Эвейн... Винтерскейл... аф Коронус. Бесконечно счастлив... встрече".

traits.locale_text: "I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

"I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

"I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

"I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

"I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

languages.text: “我相信我们还没有……恰当地彼此介绍过。”{n}这个年轻人的嘴唇上冒着血泡，你几乎听不见他的声音。但即便如此，他的声音依然很悦耳、很有礼貌。{/n}“艾维尼……温特斯凯尔……阿夫·科罗努斯。很高兴……能认识您。”
languages.original_text: "I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

traits.locale_text: “我相信我们还没有……恰当地彼此介绍过。”{n}这个年轻人的嘴唇上冒着血泡，你几乎听不见他的声音。但即便如此，他的声音依然很悦耳、很有礼貌。{/n}“艾维尼……温特斯凯尔……阿夫·科罗努斯。很高兴……能认识您。”

languages.text: 「確か…自己紹介がまだだったんだ…」{n}若者の唇には血が滲んでおり、その声はかすかにしか聞こえない。それでも、耳に心地よい響きと、礼儀正しさは残されている。{/n}「エヴァイン…ウィンタースケール…アフ・コロナス。お目にかかれて…光栄だ」
languages.original_text: "I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやら…我々のことはよくお知りになられていないようだ…」{n}若者の唇には血が滲んでおり、その声はほとんど聞こえない。それでも、耳に心地よい響きと、礼儀正しさは残されている。{/n}「エヴァイン…ウィンタースケール…アフ・コロナス。お目にかかれて…光栄です」
「確か…自己紹介がまだだったんだ…」{n}若者の唇には血が滲んでおり、その声はかすかにしか聞こえない。それでも、耳に心地よい響きと、礼儀正しさは残されている。{/n}「エヴァイン…ウィンタースケール…アフ・コロナス。お目にかかれて…光栄だ」

languages.text: "Ich glaube, wir wurden einander noch nicht ... ordnungsgemäß vorgestellt ..." {n}Auf den Lippen des jungen Mannes blubbern Blutblasen. Seine Stimme ist kaum hörbar, aber dennoch melodisch und höflich.{/n} "Evayne ... Winterzunder ... von Koronus. Sehr erfreut ... Eure Bekanntschaft zu machen."
languages.original_text: "I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, wir wurden einander noch nicht ... ordnungsgemäß vorgestellt ..." {n}Auf den Lippen des jungen Mannes blubbern Blutblasen. Seine Stimme ist kaum hörbar, aber dennoch melodisch und höflich.{/n} "Evayne ... Winterzunder ... von Koronus. Sehr erfreut ... Eure Bekanntschaft zu machen."

languages.text: « Je ne crois pas que nous ayons été... convenablement présentés. » {n}Du sang jaillit des lèvres du jeune homme, et sa voix est à peine audible, mais elle reste mélodieuse et parfaitement courtoise.{/n} « Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Ravi... de faire votre connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne crois pas que nous ayons été... convenablement présentés. » {n}Du sang jaillit des lèvres du jeune homme, et sa voix est à peine audible, mais elle reste mélodieuse et parfaitement courtoise.{/n} « Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Ravi... de faire votre connaissance. »

languages.text: «Creo que no nos hemos... presentado debidamente». {n}La sangre que el joven tiene en los labios burbujea y apenas oyes su voz, que pese a todo sigue siendo melodiosa y cortés.{/n} «Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Un placer ... conocerle».
languages.original_text: "I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que no nos hemos... presentado debidamente». {n}La sangre que el joven tiene en los labios burbujea y apenas oyes su voz, que pese a todo sigue siendo melodiosa y cortés.{/n} «Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Un placer ... conocerle».

languages.text: "Usulüyle takdim edildiğimizi... Sanmıyorum." {n}Dudaklarından köpük köpük kan gelen genç adamın sesi, zar zor çıkıyor olsa da melodik ve fevkalade nazik bir tınıya sahip.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Sizinle tanıştığıma... Pek memnun oldum."
languages.original_text: "I don't believe we've been... properly introduced..." {n}Blood is bubbling on the young man's lips, and his voice is barely audible, but even now it remains melodious and quite courteous.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Greatly pleased... to make your acquaintance."

traits.locale_text: "Usulüyle takdim edildiğimizi... Sanmıyorum." {n}Dudaklarından köpük köpük kan gelen genç adamın sesi, zar zor çıkıyor olsa da melodik ve fevkalade nazik bir tınıya sahip.{/n} "Evayne... Winterscale... af Koronus. Sizinle tanıştığıma... Pek memnun oldum."
